sentences.english: Supported user-defined unread notification of automatical protection.
sentences.chinese: 支持用户自定义的新未读消息弹出提示。

sentences.english: This functionality would also address problems with pop-up blockers.
sentences.chinese: 该功能还会解决弹出拦截器问题。

sentences.english: She played the main part of the songs on the lowest guitar strings.

sentences.english: The filter-through of stimulus cash to the pachinko parlours has historical precedent.

sentences.english: It's a mix between football, basketball and hockey with trampolines thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 有包括橄榄球，篮球以及曲棍球，利用蹦床弹跳发球。

sentences.english: The men, who included four guards, were injured by rubber bullets and machetes.
sentences.chinese: 包括4名警卫在内的伤者因橡胶弹和大砍刀而受伤。

sentences.english: All these details can be retrieved by activating a pop-up window.

sentences.english: I got some great shots of the boy who plays the guitar on the left.

sentences.english: A pop-up tip will tell you whether it is on or off.
sentences.chinese: 一个弹出提示会告诉你高亮是启用还是关闭了。
